title: (x) Wieler logo wide slab serif - Hellenic Wide {Rainer}
content:
I think their logo is very sharp, but I'm having a hard time figuring out what font they've used.

[http://www.wieler.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20110214132822/http:/www.wieler.com/ "http://www.wieler.com")

Thanks!
author: jbaraga

comments.content: Pretty old design, brandnew interpreted by Jason Walcott: [Hellenic Wide](http://web.archive.org/web/20110214132822/http:/www.veer.com/search/results.aspx?keyword=JBT0000094%20JBT0000095%20JBT0000096).

There's also a more squarish version from Nathan Williams called [58 Rodeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20110214132822/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/baseline/58_rodeo/?sample_text=WIELER&sample_size=48).

I noticed this page in our referrer logs and thought I'd add a correction. The logo actually uses a font called Hefty Regular. Hellenic Wide and Zapata are very close -- Hefty Regular is probably based on one or the other.
Hefty Regular is indeed based on Hellenic Wide. THX for dropping by. ;^)
